title: Groundhog Goes Outside
description: This book shares the story of Groundhog Day-from the groundhog's perspective. Gus the groundhog can't remember the last time he saw his shadow, and he is getting worried. Will Gus be able to find his shadow or something even more exciting? Students will ask their own questions and think about the difference between reality and fantasy as they read the groundhog's tale.
meta: burrow, cheer, deep, gathered, grinned, shadow, worried
Use the reading strategy of asking and answering questions to understand text
Reality and Fantasy : Discriminate between reality and fantasy
Consonant Digraph Sounds : Discriminate consonant digraph /sh/ sound
Question Marks : Recognize and use questions marks
Concept Words : Identify and use question words

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
